title: Siat Yeh Ritual Experience (Half-day)
overview: Witness the lively Siat Yeh ritual, a traditional water fight ceremony in Bali.

stops.description: Arrive and observe the Siat Yeh water fight ritual.

title: Siat Yeh Ritual & Village Tour (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring the Siat Yeh ritual and village culture.

stops.description: Arrive and witness the Siat Yeh water fight ritual.
Tour the local village and interact with the community.
Participate in a workshop or discussion about Balinese rituals.
